attributes.action: Allow rebate or credit for genuine users of 4x 4 veichles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think increasing the tax or 4 x 4 veichles is good but in will penalise those who actually need them, ie those who use them day in day out as part of their business ie farmers etc, Also residents who live in extreme rural conditions. for example I live in a flood plain and may property and the 3 surrounding ones can only be accessed by 4 x 4  several times a year. If I can not get out I can not work. That is wrong. driving range rovers in inner city areas is a valid target. byt as with most things to stop a few most suffer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
